title: Albania national under-23 football team
text:
The Albania national under-23 football team represents <a href="Albania">Albania</a> in international <a href="Association%20football">football</a> at this age level and is controlled by <a href="Albanian%20Football%20Association">Albanian Football Association</a>, the governing body for football in Albania. The team competed in the <a href="UEFA%20European%20Under-23%20Championship">UEFA European Under-23 Championship</a> & <a href="Balkan%20Youth%20Championship">Balkan Youth Championship</a>, but after the rule change in 1975s, the event had an age limit of 21.
History.
Balkan Youth Championship.
Albania Under-23 participated in the <a href="Balkan%20Youth%20Championship">Balkan Youth Championship</a> tournaments from 1969 until 1976 when the age limit rule changed to the under-21 and then Albania participated with the <a href="Albania%20national%20under-21%20football%20team">Albania national under-21 football team</a>. In two first tournament 1969 & 1970, Albania U23 was ranked 3rd out 5 national teams participations in both occasions. Then in the 1971 & 1972 tournament they were ranked in the 4th place in both cases. They withdrew from the 1973 tournament and in the 1974 edition, Albania U23 managed to reach the final after winning Group B against <a href="Turkey%20national%20under-23%20football%20team">Turkey U23</a> & <a href="Greece%20national%20under-23%20football%20team">Greece U23</a>. In the final they lost 1–0 against <a href="Romania%20national%20under-23%20football%20team">Romania U23</a>.
UEFA European Under-23 Championship.
Albania U23 participated in 2 out 3 UEFA European Under-23 Championship in <a href="1972%20UEFA%20European%20Under-23%20Championship">1972</a> & <a href="1974%20UEFA%20European%20Under-23%20Championship">1974</a> where they were eliminated in both cases in the qualifying stages.
